title: Strong cell

properties.name: description
properties.value: Strong cells are an item obtained during the Guardians of the Rift minigame. Players can obtain one by imbuing an uncharged cell at the Earth, Nature, or Law Altar, which are accessible directly by entering the active Portal Guardians of that type.

Strong cell

Item ID26885

Strong cells are an item obtained during the Guardians of the Rift minigame. Players can obtain one by imbuing an uncharged cell at the Earth, Nature, or Law Altar, which are accessible directly by entering the active Portal Guardians of that type.

The strong cell can be used alongside a chisel to create strong elemental and catalytic guardians, be placed on a medium cell tile to create strong barriers, or reinforce an existing barrier.

When inspected, the chatbox will state "A magical cell charged with a high amount of runic energy."

  1. ^ Only if no strong or overcharged cells are present in inventory.
  2. ^ Only if an uncharged, weak, or medium cell is present in inventory. Only one charged cell can be carried at a time.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 March 2022
(update)

The item now has a "Drop" option instead of "Destroy". Previously, the destroy text was "You will have to charge another uncharged cell at a runic altar."
